text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
Warm memories cradle me in a<n>dream. Memories of
childhood, of the<n>holidays...

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
After prepping the ingredients, Father<n>bakes us a special
French holiday<n>cake. It's so sweet and—

text_block_list.name: Young Flash
text_block_list.text: Mmm! Papa, it's amazing! How areyour cakes always so good?!

text_block_list.name: Flash's Father
text_block_list.text: Well, that's because I follow therecipe. And not just any recipe—theperfect recipe, tested andrefined time and time again.

text_block_list.name: Flash's Father
text_block_list.text: The ingredients, baking time, eventhe way I use this powderedsugar—everything is predetermined. Isimply go through the correctmotions.

text_block_list.name: Flash's Father
text_block_list.text: Not a gram too much or too little.Precision is what makes my cakestaste good, and it's my source ofpride as a patissier.

text_block_list.name: Flash's Father
text_block_list.text: Do you understand, Flash? Our—

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: ...Huh? Where... am I?

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
Sorry, could you tell me what's<n>happened? Why am I in the
nurse's<n>office?

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: I see... I must have been more<n>fatigued than I expected.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
But if it's nothing serious, I'll still be<n>able to race tomorrow.
Am I correct to<n>assume that?

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
I know. I won't be able to give my<n>best performance like
this. That's<n>what you want to say, I'm guessing.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
Still, I must race tomorrow, no matter<n>what. I... won't get a
second chance.
choice_data_list: Why do you push yourself so hard?

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
When I left for Japan, I made a<n>promise to my parents. I
promised that<n>one year later, they'd see how I'd<n>grown
up properly on my own.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
In return, I asked for just one day of<n>their time. They've
upheld their end of<n>the deal and found time in their busy<n>
schedules for me.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
So I have to respond in kind... and<n>show them results
befitting the<n>daughter of two meisters.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
Meisters—it's a system Germany has<n>for certifying
artisans. My father<n>worked hard to earn the title of<n>
meister and achieved his dream of<n>opening a cake shop.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
My mother was once a racer like me,<n>but she's since
retired and, after<n>earning the same qualification, started<n>
helping my father.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
One worked steadily over years and<n>years to open his own
bakery as<n>planned. The other raced her time on<n>the track,
then immediately moved on<n>to starting a second life.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
I have nothing but respect for my<n>parents, and just like
them, I want to<n>follow my own proper path in life.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
But what exactly is that path? When I<n>asked myself this
question, I thought<n>of my mother's racing career.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
There is no greater pride for an<n>Umamusume than racing...
So I<n>decided that I, too, would run.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
I decided I would train duly day after<n>day and place as
planned in every<n>race. Then, eventually, I would win a<n>G1,
and stand as proud as any racer<n>could hope to.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
Afterward, having achieved all my<n>goals... I would be a
daughter worthy<n>of my parents.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
So that's the real reason she cares<n>about her schedules so
much. She<n>just wants to make her parents<n>proud, and she
wants to do it her way.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
Passing out was unplanned, but<n>nothing more needs
correcting beyond<n>this point.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
Even if it were my own mistakes<n>which led to this... I can't
afford to turn<n>back now.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She wants to improve. No trainer<n>would call that a mistake.
But she also<n>needs to be flexible.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Not that there's much I can do at this<n>point. After hearing
her story, I<n>wouldn't dream of stopping her from<n>racing.
All I can say is...
choice_data_list: Your feelings will get through to your parents.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: ...My feelings, you say.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
First, you said they'd be proud of my<n>hard work, and now
this—you talk only<n>in vague emotions. I guess our minds<n>
operate on different wavelengths.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
Oh, I've forgotten to thank you. You<n>were the one who
carried me here,<n>were you not?

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
I... have been curious. Why do you<n>insist on looking out for
me?
choice_data_list: Well, I can't just let you overwork yourself.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: ...I'm sorry?
choice_data_list: You're so serious and yet so... clueless.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: ...Me? Clueless?

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
I've never been told that before... But<n>considering how far
I've come, I<n>don't think I'm clueless.
choice_data_list:
Well, sometimes you just need a change of
perspective.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: ...Right. Thank you.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Ah, Flash! You're finally back! Jeez,<n>do you have any idea
how worried I<n>was?

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Are you ignoring me? Hello?<n>Flaaash?

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Falcon, do I strike you as... clueless?

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Uh, yeah.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: ...How so?

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
I mean, you tend to get tunnel vision,<n>and then it's like your
head doesn't<n>have room for anything else.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Like right now, for instance. You were<n>probably too busy
thinking about how<n>you need to get back to your dorm or<n>
whatever, so you still haven't<n>noticed.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: ...Noticed what?

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: The nice slippers from the nurse's<n>office you've got on. ☆

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Hehehe, you really had no idea! Hey,<n>you know what would
be nice?<n>Someone to point these things out to<n>you. ☆

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: ...Maybe so.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Anywho, as long as you're all right,<n>I'm happy. Get some
sleep, and good<n>luck tomorrow!

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: All right.
